item.title: Extend on-hand inventory entities FinOps
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Extend on-hand inventory entities in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations by adding custom fields to tables, views, and entities. Step-by-step guide for inventory integration customization.

item.title: Dynamics 365 finance and operations ODATA consuming - Length cannot be less than zero
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving ‘Length cannot be less than zero’ error when consuming OData services from Dynamics 365 Finance Operations in .NET applications.

item.title: Consuming Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete guide for consuming D365 Finance and Operations OData services from .NET applications including authentication, service principal setup, and C# implementation.

item.title: Insert multiple records in a single transaction using Odata from Postman
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to insert multiple records in a single OData batch request using Postman for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations integration.
